name: Cristal
snippet: Cristal is the brand name of a Champagne produced by Louis Roederer. Cristal has a flat-bottomed clear, "crystal" bottle, anti-UV cellophane wrapper, and gold label.
HowToServe: Champagne should be served in tall, narrow glasses known as flutes to minimize dispersal of its fizz, as the bubbles hae a smaller surface area on which to break. Avoid the flat "saucer" glasses.

name: Moet & Chandon
snippet: Moet & Chandon, or Moet, is a French winery and co-owner of the luxury goods company Moet-Hennessy. Moet et Chandon is one of the world's largest champagne producers.
HowToServe: Champagne should be served in tall, narrow glasses known as flutes to minimize dispersal of its fizz, as the bubbles hae a smaller surface area on which to break. Avoid the flat "saucer" glasses.
